text: heliri; avaru adestu kala (alli) iddarembudannu allahane heccu ballanu. Avanu akasagala hagu bhumiya ella gupta samacaragalannu ballanu. Avanu itarellariginta cennagi avugalannu noduttane mattu keluttane. Avugalige (bhumyakasagalige) avana horatu bere posakarilla. Avanu tanna adhipatyadalli yarannu palugolisuvudilla
